summary.para: Contains interfaces and classes that are specific to XAF ASP.NET Core Blazor applications.
Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your ASP.NET Core Blazor application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with methods to configure authentication in your application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Blazor.ApplicationBuilder.BlazorSecurityBuilderExtensions.AddExternalAuthentication(DevExpress.ExpressApp.Blazor.ApplicationBuilder.IBlazorSecurityBuilder,System.Action{DevExpress.ExpressApp.Security.ExternalAuthenticationProviderOptions})

member.param: Allows you to enable and configure the Security System in your application, and chain further configuration.
Options that you can use to configure external authentication (custom or OAuth2).
member.returns: Allows you to enable and configure the Security System in your application, and chain further configuration.
